Question
========
The shortest distance between two points on a wave where the wave pattern is 
repeated is the

Answerlist
----------
* wavelength
* wave pulse
* period
* frequency
* amplitude
* wave speed


Solution
========
The wavelength is the shortest distance between two points on a wave where the
wave pattern is repeated.
